name: BonaSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask robo cleaner to start cleaning.”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robo cleaner
des:
Want cleaner floors and carpets? Just speak up!
You can control Bona vacuum cleaner by using only your voice. To get started, make sure you have an ”Bona” account registered in the ”Bona” app and your robot is connected and online.
Then, you just need to enable the ”Bona” skill by clicking on the "Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your ”Bona” account.
